name: flixpatrol-top10
description: Get top10 list from flixpatrol and upload them to trakt

scripts.package: npm run build && rm -rf bin/ && mkdir -p bin/ && npx ncc build build/app.js -o build/tmp && npx pkg build/tmp/index.js --targets=node22-linux-x64 --public -o bin/flixpatrol-top10-linux-x64 && npx pkg build/tmp/index.js --targets=node22-linux-arm64 --public -o bin/flixpatrol-top10-linux-arm64 && npx pkg build/tmp/index.js --targets=node22-macos-x64 --public -o bin/flixpatrol-top10-macos-x64 && npx pkg build/tmp/index.js --targets=node22-win-x64 --public -o bin/flixpatrol-top10-win-x64

author: Navino16
